name: go-plus
description: Makes working with Go in Atom awesome.
author: Joe Fitzgerald <jfitzgerald@pivotal.io> (http://github.com/joefitzgerald)

disabledBundledPackages.title: Disabled Bundled Packages
disabledBundledPackages.description: go-plus bundles some third party packages; if you indicate that you do not want to be prompted for package installation, this comma separated list of package names will be updated

displayMode.title: Panel Display Mode
displayMode.description: Control the behavior of the go-plus panel when a new Atom window is opened

focusOnFailure.title: Focus the go-plus panel on failure
focusOnFailure.description: If the panel is hidden, or the panel is showing a different tab, the panel will be expanded and the output tab focused when a failure occurs.

fontSize.title: Panel Font Size
fontSize.description: Control the font size for content displayed in the panel

gopath.title: GOPATH
gopath.description: (Not Recommended For Use) If you have issues setting your GOPATH in your environment, you can use this to establish a fallback value. See https://github.com/joefitzgerald/go-config/wiki/GOPATH for more information.

compileOnSave.title: Compile on Save
compileOnSave.description: Compile the current package when a file is saved and provide linter errors.

additionalBuildArgs.title: Additional build/install args
additionalBuildArgs.description: Arguments to pass to `go build` and `go install` commands.

additionalTestArgs.title: Additional test args
additionalTestArgs.description: Arguments to pass to `go test` commands.

scopeBlacklist.title: Scope Blacklist
scopeBlacklist.description: Suggestions will not be shown when the cursor is inside the following comma-delimited scope(s).
scopeBlacklist.default: .source.go .comment, go source_file comment, .source.go .constant.numeric, go source_file int_literal, .source.go .string.quoted, go source_file block interpreted_string_literal

suppressBuiltinAutocompleteProvider.title: Suppress The Provider Built-In To autocomplete-plus
suppressBuiltinAutocompleteProvider.description: Suppress the provider built-in to the autocomplete-plus package when editing .go files.

suppressActivationForCharacters.title: Suppress Activation For Characters
suppressActivationForCharacters.description: Suggestions will not be provided when you type one of these characters.

snippetMode.title: Snippet Mode
snippetMode.description: When inserting suggestions for funcs, generate a snippet that includes parenthesis only (none), argument name (name), or argument name and type (nameAndType).

proposeBuiltins.title: Propose Builtins
proposeBuiltins.description: Add built-in types, functions and constants to an autocompletion proposals. Default: true.

unimportedPackages.title: Unimported Packages
unimportedPackages.description: Provide suggestions for unimported packages. Default: true.

formatOnSave.title: Run Format Tool On Save
formatOnSave.description: Run the configured format tool each time a file is saved

tool.title: Format Tool
tool.description: Choose one: goimports, goreturns, or gofmt

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Stop trying to update tools after this number of milliseconds

highlightIdentifiers.title: Highlight Identifiers When Cursor Moves
highlightIdentifiers.description: When a cursor is moved, highlight all occurrences of the identifier in the document

args.title: gometalinter Arguments
args.description: Arguments to be passed when invoking `gometalinter`. Please ensure the `--json` argument is always included. Arguments are comma-separated.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Use guru or godef for go to definition

runTestsOnSave.title: Run Tests On Save
runTestsOnSave.description: Run `go test -coverprofile` each time a file is saved

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Stop running tests after this number of milliseconds

runTestsWithCoverage.title: Run Tests With Coverage
runTestsWithCoverage.description: Runs `go test` with `-coverprofile` flag set, enabling coverage to be shown in the editor

runTestsWithShortFlag.title: Run Tests With Short Flag Set

runTestsWithVerboseFlag.title: Run Tests With Verbose Flag Set

coverageHighlightMode.title: Coverage Highlight Mode
coverageHighlightMode.description: Control the way that coverage highlighting occurs

coverageDisplayMode.title: Coverage Display Mode
coverageDisplayMode.description: Control the way that coverage is displayed in the editor: gutter, or highlight
